title: Oma's German Apple Pancake
markdown:
Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

* ½ cup flour
* 1 Tbs sugar
* 2 large eggs
* ⅔ cup half and half
* 1 Tsp vanilla
* 2 Tbs butter
* 1 ¼ lbs apples, 3-4 apples pealed and grated or cut into slices
* ¼ cup brown sugar
* ¼ tsp cinnamon
* 1 tsp lemon Juice
* Confectioners sugar for topping
* Preheat oven to 500 degrees
* Heat 10 in ovenproof skillet in the oven as it comes to temp
* Mix flour, sugar and a pinch of salk in a bowl. In a second bowl wisk eggs, half and half, and vanilla until combined. Add liquid ingredients to dry 
*
